name: Ember Pup
description: A small fiery canine that packs a surprising punch. Great starter for new lab owners.
lore: Ember Pups are among the first monsters any lab owner creates. Despite their small size, their fiery temperament makes them fierce combatants.

name: Flame Striker
description: A fearsome fire warrior with devastating attack power. The backbone of many fire-based teams.
lore: Born from pure concentrated fire essences, Flame Strikers are living embodiments of destruction. Their flames burn hot enough to melt steel.

name: Magma Titan
description: A massive molten golem that absorbs damage and retaliates with volcanic fury.
lore: When fire and nature essences clash in the synthesis chamber, the result is a creature of living magma. Magma Titans are nearly indestructible.

name: Aqualing
description: A sturdy water-type monster perfect for early game defense. Its liquid body absorbs physical attacks.
lore: Aqualings form when water essences bond with neutral energy. Their gelatinous bodies make them surprisingly durable in battle.

name: Tidal Serpent
description: A swift aquatic predator that strikes with the force of ocean currents.
lore: Tidal Serpents are the apex predators of the water element. Their speed in combat is matched only by their ferocity.

name: Frost Leviathan
description: An ancient ice dragon of immense power. One of the rarest monsters in existence.
lore: Legends say the Frost Leviathan existed before the labs were built. Recreating one requires mastery of both water and shadow essences.

name: Sproutling
description: A cheerful plant monster that heals allies and generates resources over time.
lore: Sproutlings are beloved by lab owners for their ability to generate essence residue, making them excellent resource farmers.

name: Thornback
description: A heavily armored plant beast covered in razor-sharp thorns. Attackers take damage just by hitting it.
lore: The Thornback's defensive capabilities are legendary. Its thorns grow back stronger each time they're broken.

name: Verdant Wyrm
description: A majestic forest dragon that empowers allies with the essence of life itself.
lore: Verdant Wyrms are the spiritual guardians of nature. Their presence alone causes plants to grow and allies to feel reinvigorated.

name: Stone Golem
description: A solid rock construct with impressive durability. The simplest tank monster to create.
lore: Stone Golems require nothing but neutral essence to create, making them accessible to even the newest lab owners.

name: Chimera Scout
description: A versatile hybrid monster that adapts to any situation. Jack of all trades.
lore: Created from opposing elements bound by neutral essence, Chimera Scouts are unpredictable fighters that keep opponents guessing.

name: Shadow Imp
description: A mischievous dark creature that strikes from the shadows with devastating speed.
lore: Shadow Imps exist between dimensions, making them nearly impossible to catch. Their attacks come from angles that shouldn't be possible.

name: Void Reaper
description: A terrifying entity from the void. Its attacks drain the life force of enemies.
lore: The Void Reaper is not truly created â€” it is summoned. Three shadow essences open a rift from which this entity emerges.

name: Abyssal Lord
description: The ultimate shadow monster. Commands the power of the abyss to annihilate all opposition.
lore: Only the most skilled lab owners dare attempt creating an Abyssal Lord. The fusion of shadow and fire produces a being of cataclysmic power.

name: Luminite
description: A radiant spirit that purifies allies and weakens dark enemies.
lore: Luminites are drawn to places of purity. Their healing light can cure even the most potent shadow corruption.

name: Solar Phoenix
description: A blazing bird of golden flames that can resurrect itself once per battle.
lore: The Solar Phoenix represents the pinnacle of light and fire synthesis. Its ability to return from defeat makes it a tournament favorite.

name: Celestial Dragon
description: The most sacred monster in existence. Its divine power can turn the tide of any battle.
lore: Ancient texts speak of the Celestial Dragon as a guardian of balance. Creating one is considered the ultimate achievement for any lab owner.

name: Steam Sprite
description: A bubbly steam elemental that boosts ally speed and provides light healing.
lore: When fire meets water in the synthesis chamber, sometimes the result is not an explosion but a playful Steam Sprite.
